info.question: How To Get Started?
info.answer: Once you are interested in learning more about our services, you can email us at contact@megaexe.com, or call us; at 07032420219/0702525356. We will send you a link to our onboarding form so you can fill out information regarding your business needs. We use this form to critically analyze your business, which also aids our business/market research.  We will organize an initial meeting with you or your rep to discuss and understand the technical implications and processes involved.

info.question: How Do We Communicate?
info.answer: We’ll usually have an initial chat on the phone, Skype, Meet or Zoom to discuss the project. Once we get started, most of the communication will take place over email, clickup or slack. This makes the process a lot easier as we’ll have all of the information saved and can come back to it later. Once we’ve finished the project, we will book you in our training sessions or your team. It’s rare that we NEED to meet people face to face. Technology allows us to do so much in a small space of time so we don’t believe face to face meetings are necessary. We are always happy to meet you in person if you really need us to but we’ll arrange a consultation price for travel and possible accommodation. depending on the distance.

info.question: How Much Does Our Service Cost?
info.answer: Our services are quoted based on the needs of each individual project. Every project is unique and requires different components, and so the cost varies depending on its complexity. We are happy to discuss your requirements in an understandable manner and provide a quote that is suitable. We’ll ask a lot of questions, assess your needs, and give you a quote based on that assessment. Our packages usually range from $250-10000. However it really depends on what kind of product you need.

info.question: Which Payment Plans / Methods Do You Have?
info.answer: We offer a variety of ways and methods that suit every individual. We normally start with a 50% down payment to help us assemble the necessary tools necessary to get the project off the ground. We will bill you another 25% once the MVP of the product is releases for testing. Final 25% will be due upon full rollout and acceptance. We also offer wide range of payment methods; This includes Payoneer, PayPal, Wise, Skrill Direct debit and Wire Transfer.

info.question: Do I Have Full Ownership Of The Completed Product?
info.answer: Yes definitely! You always have full ownership over your software product once it’s deployed. From the start, based on your experience and approval, we will make sure all the accounts created for the project is with the companies’. We will have a central, secured access to those accounts, which you can revoke once the project is done. Every information that you deemed proprietary will remain so. And any point in time you require any information, we are more than happy to assist you with them.
